Our Services

We cover every logistics aspect so you can focus on creativity.

Parking Suspensions & Permits

Full management of filming permits in Paris, Lyon, Marseille and across France. Parking suspensions and signage.

24/7 Set Security & Guarding

24/7 protection with security agents specialized in film & TV. Access control and confidentiality.

Technical Unit & Specialized Transport

Technical crews, equipment handling, and secure vehicle convoying nationwide.

Frequently Asked Questions

All you need to know about our logistics and security services.

How fast can you obtain permits in Paris?

We handle administrative requests with the City of Paris and authorities to ensure compliance and safety.

What is the cost of 24/7 set guarding?

Pricing depends on duration, location, and security level. We provide tailored quotes.

Do you operate outside Paris?

Yes, nationwide coverage including Lyon, Marseille, Bordeaux, Lille, and more.

Ready to Secure Your Next Production?

Contact us for a free needs assessment and a tailored quote within 48 hours.
